SummaryEnglish: Cha Seok Hoon is mired in massive debt, but there's one way out: complete submission to Yoo Se Young, a rich femme fatale willing to bail out Seok Hoon in exchange for his servility. But between his marriage to Na Hong Joo and Se Young's increasingly demanding advances, Seok Hoon quickly discovers his lifeline is a huge deal breaker.

1.SummaryEnglish: Wealthy Kang Min Woo, business woman Yoo Se Young and married couple Cha Seok Hoon and Na Hong Joo all travel to Hong Kong, each with a different purpose, unaware that all their paths will soon cross.

2.SummaryEnglish: With Seok Hoon accepting Se Young's offer, Hong Joo returns to Korea alone and makes a connection with Roy, Min Woo's young son.

3.SummaryEnglish: Back home, Seok Hoon sets out to pick up the pieces of his failed company while Hong Joo receives an interesting job offer.

4.SummaryEnglish: Min Woo makes a move that threatens to undermine Se Young's latest business deal. Meanwhile Min Woo's wife becomes increasingly suspicious of his actions.

5.SummaryEnglish: Hong Joo's distrust of Seok Hoon continues to grow, prompting her to make an important decision about their marriage.

6.SummaryEnglish: Min Woo and Se Young clash as they both move ahead with their attempted acquisition of the M Hotel group.

7.SummaryEnglish: Seok Hoon and Se Young must travel to the countryside together in an attempt to convince President Doo to allow them into negotiations for the M Hotel acquisition.

8.SummaryEnglish: As negotiations for the M Hotel acquisition come to a close, Seok Hoon resigns and attempts to reconcile with Hong Joo.

9.SummaryEnglish: As Seok Hoon and Hong Joo come to an important decision about their marriage, Min Woo gives his wife an ultimatum.

10.SummaryEnglish: Hong Joo agrees to accompany Min Woo to a party, unaware that Seok Hoon and Se Young will be there as well.

11.SummaryEnglish: After his wife confronts Hong Joo, Min Woo finalizes their divorce. Seok and Se Young begin taking their relationship to the next level.

12.SummaryEnglish: On the eve of her wedding, Hong Joo gets her revenge on Se Young and Seok Hoon.

13.SummaryEnglish: Kang Min Woo conspires behind Seok Hoon and Se Young's backs and wins over investors with his hotel business plans. Meanwhile, Hong Joo adjusts to her new role as President Kang's wife.

14.SummaryEnglish: Se Young breaks up with Seok Hoon. Her hospital-bound father and Chairman hires her back on as president of Dong Sung Group. Seok Hoon is then hired by Kang Min Woo's company.

15.SummaryEnglish: Min Woo sets up to deliver a devastating blowing to Dong Sung Group while Seok Hoon gets close to finding evidence of Min Woo's financial misdealings.

16.SummaryEnglish: When Seok Hoon delivers proof of Min Woo's illegal slush funds to the state prosecutor, Min Woo suspects Hong Joo has betrayed him. Meanwhile, with the tax audit taken care of and her health failing, Se Young finally elects to have surgery.

17.SummaryEnglish: On the eve of her surgery, Se Young receives news that her health is worse than she feared. Ji Sun reveals her pregnancy to Min Woo, his mother and Hong Joo to devastating results.

18.SummaryEnglish: Distraught over her health, Se Young ends things with Seok Hoon. Heartbroken, Seok Hoon accepts a transfer to New York.

19.SummaryEnglish: While Se Young recovers from her surgery, Seok Hoon takes control of Dong Sung Group, determined to protect it from a hostile takeover by Min Woo.

20.SummaryEnglish: Se Young comes to terms with her cancer, determined to fight it with Seok Hoon by her side.
